eu.mf2c.security.ac.tcp

Class ACLibServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.mf2c.security.ac.tcp.ACLibServer

  • public class ACLibServer
extends Object
    A TCP server wrapping the AC Library to enable loose coupling with the other blocks in an Agent. Intra Agent communication will be over private Docker network.

    author Shirley Crompton email shirley.crompton@stfc.ac.uk org Data Science and Technology Group, UKRI Science and Technology Council Created 29 Mar 2019

      port number, default to 46080
